content.text: Match ends, Las Palmas 1, Real Madrid 2.
Second Half ends, Las Palmas 1, Real Madrid 2.
Attempt missed. Sergio Araujo (Las Palmas) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left following a set piece situation.
Attempt blocked. Pedro Bigas (Las Palmas) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Jonathan Viera with a cross.
Hand ball by Álvaro Arbeloa (Real Madrid).
Attempt saved. Jonathan Viera (Las Palmas) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top right corner.

Momo (Las Palmas) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Sergio Ramos (Real Madrid).
Substitution, Real Madrid. Marcelo replaces Luka Modric.
Goal!  Las Palmas 1, Real Madrid 2. Casemiro (Real Madrid) header from the right side of the six yard box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Jesé with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Real Madrid. Conceded by Pedro Bigas.
Goal!  Las Palmas 1, Real Madrid 1. Willian José (Las Palmas) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Momo.
